You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.Ofhr3dZhMHtOuKKg]{Diversion} as a bonus feat. If you already have this feat, you gain a different feat that lacks prerequisites. When you use the Diversion feat to allow multiple allies to hide, you take a â€“3 penalty to your Bluff check for every ally after the first, and on a failed check. You gain a bonus to Bluff checks to create a distraction equal to any attack roll bonuses you have that specifically apply to resolving dirty trick combat maneuvers. You must have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.0Pq35gvSI2JlD682]{Improved Combat Maneuver (Combat)} (dirty trick) to select this vanguard discipline.
